mission: Create a happy, healthy and creative environment where every child’s rights are protected, ensuring education, nutrition, safety and participation.

programs.name: CyberSmart Heroes
programs.description: Awareness program on online safety reaching over 58,000 children with volunteer trainers.

programs.name: Don’t Help Children by Employing Them
programs.description: National campaign dispelling myths around child labour and mobilizing community action.

programs.name: STEM and Digital Learning Centers
programs.description: Innovative educational initiatives to prepare children for future opportunities.

community_stories.name: Sanjana
community_stories.description: From an underserved community, she won gold in a karate tournament, empowered through education and life skills.

community_stories.name: Mahek
community_stories.description: Overcame societal stigma around menstruation to continue education and aspire to become a doctor.

community_stories.name: Sandhya
community_stories.description: Pursuing law degree to become an IAS officer despite economic hardships and lack of infrastructure.

events.name: Walk to EmpowHER
events.description: Awareness walk for girls' education with participation from over 2,800 people.

events.name: Kala Ghoda Arts Festival Installation
events.description: Interactive art to encourage outdoor play for children, attracting 9 lakh visitors.
